00010 EagleWorker* EagleWorker_New(int workerId, struct EagleInstance_ *instance)
00011 {
00012     EagleWorker *worker = (EagleWorker*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleWorker_New.1", sizeof(EagleWorker));
00013     if(NULL == worker) {
00014         return NULL;
00015     }
00016     
00017     worker->workerId = workerId;
00018     worker->instance = instance;
00019     
00020     return worker;
00021 }

00023 void EagleWorker_runJob(EaglePlanJob *job)
00024 {
00025     int i;
00026     EaglePlan_resumeTimer(job->plan);
00027     for(i = 0; i < job->plan->usedOperations; ++i) {
00028         EaglePlanOperation *epo = job->plan->operations[i];
00029         EaglePage *destination = NULL, *source1 = NULL, *source2 = NULL;
00030         
00031         /* prepare arguments */
00032         if(epo->destination >= 0) {
00033             if(epo->destination >= job->plan->buffersNeeded) {
00034                 char msg[1024];
00035                 sprintf(msg, "destination %d is greater than allowed %d buffers!", epo->destination, job->plan->buffersNeeded);
00036                 EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, msg);
00037                 return;
00038             }
00039             destination = job->buffers[epo->destination];
00040         }
00041         if(epo->source1 >= 0) {
00042             if(epo->source1 >= job->plan->buffersNeeded) {
00043                 char msg[1024];
00044                 sprintf(msg, "source1 %d is greater than allowed %d buffers!", epo->source1, job->plan->buffersNeeded);
00045                 EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, msg);
00046                 return;
00047             }
00048             source1 = job->buffers[epo->source1];
00049         }
00050         if(epo->source2 >= 0) {
00051             if(epo->source2 >= job->plan->buffersNeeded) {
00052                 char msg[1024];
00053                 sprintf(msg, "source2 %d is greater than allowed %d buffers!", epo->source2, job->plan->buffersNeeded);
00054                 EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, msg);
00055                 return;
00056             }
00057             source2 = job->buffers[epo->source2];
00058         }
00059         
00060         /* execute page operation */
00061         epo->function(destination, source1, source2, epo->obj);
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void* EagleWorker_begin(void *obj)
00066 {
00067     EagleWorker *worker = (EagleWorker*) obj;
00068     
00069     while(1) {
00070         EaglePlanJob *job = NULL;
00071         
00072         /* ask the instance for the next job */
00073         job = EagleInstance_nextJob(worker->instance);
00074         
00075         /* run the job is one is returned */
00076         if(NULL != job) {
00077             /* run operations */
00078             EagleWorker_runJob(job);
00079             
00080             /* free */
00081             EaglePlan_stopTimer(job->plan);
00082             EaglePlanJob_Delete(job);
00083         }
00084         else {
00085             return NULL;
00086         }
00087     }
00088     
00089     return NULL;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void EagleWorker_start(EagleWorker *worker)
00093 {
00094     pthread_create(&worker->thread, NULL, EagleWorker_begin, worker);
00095 }
00096 
00097 void EagleWorker_join(EagleWorker *worker)
00098 {
00099     pthread_join(worker->thread, NULL);
00100 }
00101 
00102 void EagleWorker_Delete(EagleWorker *worker)
00103 {
00104     EagleMemory_Free(worker);
00105 }
